General.Name: Boku Inc
General.Description: Boku, Inc. provides mobile billing and payment solutions for mobile network operators and merchants. Its solutions enable consumers to make online payments using their mobile devices. The company offers digital payments solutions, including mobile wallets, real-time payments schemes, and direct carrier billing for merchants. It also provides mobile identity and authentication solutions. The company connects its customers with mobile network operators billing, identity, and sales systems. It operates in the United states, Europe, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 660 Market Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94104
